summary: This document is a chain of emails from October 2019 between FBI Victim Services Division personnel and others, coordinating outreach to victims of Jeffrey Epstein for upcoming briefings in Miami and New York. It includes a list of eight additional victim names (redacted) and discusses logistical arrangements.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the case; the briefings are for victims of his crimes.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division is hosting a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division is hosting a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively coordinating briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
The email chain references a list of eight additional Epstein victims, but their names are redacted in the provided text.
The communication is between FBI personnel and legal representatives, indicating organized outreach to victims through their attorneys.
The briefings were scheduled for October 15, 2019, in Miami and October 23, 2019, in New York.
The correspondence highlights the FBI's victim notification and support efforts following Epstein's arrest and death.
